uıd2lx1.description: Get X index of chess by UID. Return (-1) if the chess is not on the board.

uıd2ly2.description: Get Y index of chess by UID. Return (-1) if the chess is not on the board.

uıd2lz3.description: Get Z index of chess by UID. Return (-1) if the chess is not on the board.

lxyz2uıd4.description: Get UID by XYZ index. Return (-1) if this position has no chess.

lz2uıd5.description: Get UID by relative UID and Z. Return (-1) if this position has no chess.

lxy2px6.description: Get physical X co-ordinate by logic X,Y index. Return (-1) if this position does not exist.

lxy2py7.description: Get physical Y co-ordinate by logic X,Y index. Return (-1) if this position does not exist.

uıd2px8.description: Get X co-ordinate by UID. Return (-1) if the chess is not on the board.

uıd2py9.description: Get Y co-ordinate by UID. Return (-1) if the chess is not on the board.

uıd2la10.description: Get Logic angle by UID, in degree. (-1) is invalid angle.

origin0.name: Origin
origin0.desc: The UID of chess at origin.

faceto1.name: FaceTo
faceto1.desc: The UID of chess to face.

lxyz2px11.description: Get physical X co-ordinate by logic X,Y,Z index.

lxyz2py12.description: Get physical Y co-ordinate by logic X,Y,Z index.

uıd2zcnt13.description: Get z count at select chess by UID. Return 0 if the chess is not on the board.

lxy2zcnt14.description: Get z count at logic X,Y index. Return 0 if this position does not exist.

pxy2lx15.description: Get logic X by physical X,Y co-ordinate.

pxy2ly16.description: Get logic Y by physical X,Y co-ordinate.

dır2uıd17.description: Get neighbor UID by UID and direction. Add 3rd parameter to indicate z-index. Return (-1) if no chess picked.

pxy2nearestpx20.description: Get nearest X co-ordinate of cell from physical position.

pxy2nearestpy21.description: Get nearest Y co-ordinate of cell from physical position.

logicdistance22.description: Get logic distance of two chess. Return (-1) if one of chess is not on the board.

emptylx23.description: Get X co-ordinate of an empty cell under "Condition:Pick an empty cell". or "Condition:Has any empty cell".

emptyly24.description: Get Y co-ordinate of an empty cell under "Condition:Pick an empty cell". or "Condition:Has any empty cell".

neigboruıd2dır26.description: Get logic direction of two neighbor chess from chess A to chessB. Return (-1) if they are not on the board.

alldırectıons27.description: Direction code for all directions (-1), used in "Condition: Pick neighbor chess".

pxy2uıd28.description: Get UID by physical X,Y co-ordinate. Add 3rd parameter to indicate z-index. Return (-1) if no chess picked.

curlx31.description: Get the current logic X index in a For Each loop.

curly32.description: Get the current logic Y index in a For Each loop.

curlz33.description: Get the current logic Z index in a For Each loop.

maxlx61.description: Get maximum of LX of all chess.

maxly62.description: Get maximum of LY of all chess.

minlx63.description: Get minimum of LX of all chess.

minly64.description: Get minimum of LY of all chess.
